question: 261. What is the size of the default subnet in each availability zone within the default VPC?
262. What is the size of the CIDR block created in the default VPC?
263. What is the size of the CIDR block created in a custom VPC?
options: D. You must select a size at VPC creation.
answers: D. You must select a size at VPC creation.

question: 264. Which of the following offers the most available IP addresses?
265. Which of the following are not created as part of the default VPC? (Choose two.)
266. Is the default VPC created by AWS public?
options: C. Only for traffic over port 80
A. Only if you set it to be public at creation time

question: 267. Which of the following statements are true? (Choose two.)
options: A. The default VPC has an internet gateway attached by default.
B. Custom VPCs do not have internet gateways attached by default.
C. The default VPC does not have an internet gateway attached by default.
D. Custom VPCs have internet gateways attached by default.
answers: A. The default VPC has an internet gateway attached by default.
B. Custom VPCs do not have internet gateways attached by default.

question: 268. Which of the following statements are true? (Choose two.)
options: B. All incoming traffic is allowed by the default security group on a VPC.
A. The default VPC has a NACL created by default.
D. The default security group for the default VPC allows inbound HTTP traffic.
C. All outgoing traffic is allowed by the default security group on a VPC.
answers: C. All outgoing traffic is allowed by the default security group on a VPC.
A. The default VPC has a NACL created by default.

question: 269. Which of the following statements are true about both the default VPC and custom VPCs? (Choose two.)
options: A. They have NACLs automatically created.
D. They have security groups automatically created.
C. They have subnets automatically created.
B. They have internet gateways automatically created.
answers: A. They have NACLs automatically created.
D. They have security groups automatically created.

question: 270. Which of the following are created automatically for the default VPC but not for custom VPCs? (Choose two.)
options: C. A security group allowing outbound traffic

question: 271. All EC2 instances in the default VPC have which of the following by default? (Choose two.)
options: D. HTTP access for incoming requests

question: 272. You created a new instance in the default VPC. You want this instance to be publicly available and serve web content. What steps do you need to take? (Choose two.)
options: C. Neither A nor B, these are done automatically.
B. Create a public IP for the instance.
A. Create an private IP for the instance.
D. Update the security group to allow traffic over HTTP and HTTPS to the instance.
answers: C. Neither A nor B, these are done automatically.
D. Update the security group to allow traffic over HTTP and HTTPS to the instance.

question: 273. You created a new instance in a custom VPC. You want this instance to be publicly available and serve web content. What steps do you need to take? (Choose two.)
options: C. Update the security group to allow traffic over HTTP and HTTPS to the instance.
A. Create an elastic IP for the instance.
B. Create an internet gateway for the VPC.
answers: C. Update the security group to allow traffic over HTTP and HTTPS to the instance.

question: 274. Why would you use a VPC endpoint to connect your VPC to S3 storage? (Choose two.)
options: C. To increase security of the VPC-to-S3 traffic
B. To avoid leaving the AWS network when traffic flows between the VPC and S3
D. To increase the speed as compared to using a NAT instance
A. To reduce the number of public IP addresses required by your VPC
answers: C. To increase security of the VPC-to-S3 traffic
B. To avoid leaving the AWS network when traffic flows between the VPC and S3

question: 275. Which of the following does a VPC endpoint require?
276. Which of the following statements about a VPC endpoint are true? (Choose two.)
options: A. It is a hardware device.
B. It is a virtual device.
answers: B. It is a virtual device.

question: 277. Which of the following statements about a VPC endpoint are true? (Choose two.)
options: D. It never routes traffic over the public Internet.
A. It requires a VPN connection.
B. It can connect to DynamoDB.
C. The VPC it is attached to must have an internet gateway.
answers: D. It never routes traffic over the public Internet.
B. It can connect to DynamoDB.

question: 278. Which of these are types of VPC endpoints? (Choose two.)
279. Which of the following can a VPC gateway endpoint connect to? (Choose two.)
280. Which of the following can a VPC interface endpoint connect to? (Choose two.)
